resources.string:
Book Hub app is platform which contains collection of books.In this you can read about various books that appear in the dashboard and you can add them to your favourites section if you like those. 

Our app features a clean reading experience designed to let you focus on the story (without an ad in sight) wherever you are, from your commute to your couch. 

This app is made as a project for 30 days of Kotlin campaign and includes various kotlin concepts. 

Thank you!

Happy learning!
